nodes.text: The Orange Conic Era was a period in the history of the Gree Enclave that began several centuries before the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. The Orange Conic Era saw the Gree species enter into a time of cultural retreat and close the planet Asation, which had long served as the gateway world to the Enclave and the main point of contact between the Gree and the rest of the galaxy. The Grand Hypergate on Asation did not see use during the Orange Conic Era until it was activated by the forces of the Dread Masters during the Galactic War.

The Orange Conic Era was first mentioned in the Codex entry for Asation, which was added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as part of Game Update 1.4: Terror From Beyond on September 26, 2012.
